translations: n.金属罐，罐（can 的复数）；易拉罐；耳机；头戴受话器

phrs.translation: 正如你所看到的；你是知道的
禁不住，忍不住；情不自禁
是的，我们可以（奥巴马竞选口号）
棉条桶；纸板桶；纤维罐；纤维板桶
需要，希望得到；能对付，将就

sentences.sentence: Steel cans were introduced sometime during the forties.
sentences.translation: 钢罐是在四十年代的某个时候开始使用的。

sentences.sentence: When nuclear fuel is manufactured it is encased in metal cans.
sentences.translation: 核燃料生产出来时被装在金属罐中。

sentences.sentence: On scavenger hunts I would always ask Mrs. Martin for empty coffee cans.
sentences.translation: 寻物游戏中，我总会找马丁夫人要空咖啡罐。
